name: ARIAVERSE
description:
ARIAVERSE is an online multiplayer player-vs-player space combat arena. No story, no microtransactions, and no DLC; just pure fast action gameplay.

The ownership of online multiplayer player-vs-player games is becoming more centralized, which creates issues around long-term maintenance. ARIAVERSE does the complete opposite, with a non-centralized server architecture in order to keep the game going.

By contributing to the community, you not only help improve the game, but also show there are other ways to create games. Rather than relying on a single entity for everything.
